entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
